sense.def:
To give someone an order
pomeni, da človek, ki ima moč ali oblast, nekomu reče, da mora nekaj narediti.

seg.quote: George went away to carry out this order.
An official inquiry was set up on the orders of the Minister of Health.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REPORT VB

sense.def:
To order someone to do something
ali
to order something to be done
pomeni, da nekdo, ki ima moč ali oblast, drugim reče, naj nekaj naredijo.

seg.quote: He ordered me to fetch the books.
Sherman ordered an investigation into her husband's death.
The Captain ordered the ship's masts to be cut down.
‘Sit down!’ he ordered.
The prime minister ordered that they be taken to prison.

sense.def:
An order
je nekaj, kar naročimo, naj nam prinesejo ali pošljejo v zameno za plačilo.

seg.quote: A waiter came to take their order.
We will continue to deal with overseas orders.

sense.def:
To order something
pomeni prositi, naj nam nekaj prinesejo ali pošljejo v zameno za plačilo.

seg.quote: She ordered an extra delivery of coal.
I'll order now.

sense.def:
Kadar je niz stvari razporejen ali narejen
in a particular order
, je ena stvar postavljena na prvo mesto ali narejena najprej, nato pride na vrsto druga, pa tretja in tako dalje.

seg.quote: The names are not in alphabetical order.

sense.def:
Order
je stanje, ko je vsaka stvar na svojem mestu ali narejena ob pravem času.

seg.quote: I felt it would create some order in our lives.
Gretchen combed her hair into some sort of order.

sense.def:
Order
je tudi stanje, ko ljudje skupaj živijo v miru in se ne spopadajo ali povzročajo nemirov.

seg.quote: ...the task of restoring order.

sense.def:
A particular order
je lahko tudi način, kako je družba urejena v določenem obdobju.

seg.quote: They don't accept the existing order.

sense.def:
An order
je tudi skupina menihov ali nun, ki živijo po določenih pravilih.

seg.quote: ...a thinker of the highest order.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj naredimo
in order to achieve a particular thing
, naredimo zato, ker želimo doseči zadani cilj.

seg.quote: He had to hurry in order to reach the next place on his schedule.
Rose trod with care, in order not to spread the dirt.
They are learning English in order that they can study engineering.

sense.def:
Kdor je
under orders to do something
, mu je nekdo, ki ima moč, ukazal, naj nekaj naredi.

Kadar je v trgovini nekaj
on order
, to pomeni, da je že naročeno, vendar še ne dobavljeno.

Kadar niz stvari naredimo, razvrstimo ali razrešimo
in order
, jih naredimo, razvrstimo ali razrešimo v pravilnem zaporedju.

To keep order
ali
to keep people in order
pomeni preprečevati drugim, da bi se vedli moteče ali nasilno.

Stroj ali naprava, ki je
in working order
, deluje pravilno in ni pokvarjena.

seg.quote: ...cars in good working order.

sense.def:
Stroj ali naprava, ki je
out of order
, je pokvarjena in ne dela.

Izraz
in the order of
ali
of the order of
uporabljamo, ko navajamo približno število;

seg.quote: Britain's contribution is something in the order of 5 per cent.

sense.def:
To order someone about
ali
to order someone around
pomeni ukazovati nekomu, kaj mora delati, in to brez razumevanja ali sočutja.
